articles.description: Anthony Santander robbed a home run in right field in the first inning and clobbered a two-run blast in the third to propel the Orioles to a 3-2 win Sunday over the visiting Seattle Mariners.
articles.content:
A day after predicting Ryan McKennas stunning walk-off homer, Anthony Santander had his own home run fun Sunday.

articles.content:

articles.title: Detroit Tigers blow shot at series win over Twins in 6-3 (10) loss - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: Nick Maton's error in the eighth inning allowed the tying run, and the Detroit Tigers allowed 3 runs in the 10th inning in a 6-3 loss to the Twins.
articles.content:
The Detroit Tigers are in the mix in the American League Central.
One sloppy play cost them from moving up in the standings.
